nodes.text: The NovaCluster Players was an itinerating troupe of actors led by Ahric Korownosek.

The NovaCluster Players was an itinerating troupe of actors led by Ahric Korownosek. During their first days, the Players achieved an amount of success and money. Korownosek used this riches to uy a Rendili-Surron Starlight-class light freighter, the Command Performance, with which they would travel from one world to another. He used further gains to customize it, adding space for actors, props, costumes and a stage, as well as a library.
Nonetheless, the NovaCluster Players were reduced to act in backwater worlds performing Coruscani and I, The Glorious Rise of the New Order and Sing, Advisors, Sing
